title: Circus
lyrics:
Aju chanlanhaessgo bich-i gadeughae neul gadeughae Baby
Modu hwanhohago dasi hwanhohae ulil hyanghae Yeah
Cause you yeah you
Neoui moseub-i neoui us-eum-i Yeah
On bam Oh nal dan kkum-e jeojge hal

Nunbusin mudaelo ikkeul-eonae



Nan inhyeongcheoleom neoleul hyanghae us-eun chae

Tto hanbal hanbal ajjilham-eul cham-aya hae

Honjaseo igyeonae on dulyeoum-e

Deo balg-ge bichnan uliui Night



Igeon deoeobs-i aleumdaun My circus

Ttaelon nun-ap-i ajjilhajiman

Wiheomhalsulog dal-aoleul My circus

Ulin oneul bam eolmana deo aleumdaulkka

Nege deonjil My heart



Mangseol-imdo eobs-i naleul neoege jeonbu neoege Yeah

Himkkeos son naemil-eo nal-agalge neoleul hyanghae



Cause you yeah you

Neoui du son-i neoui ma-eum-i Yeah

Oh nal Oh nal nohchigo mandamyeon

Hwansang-eun buseojyeo kkeutnagessji



Saehayan os-eun kkoch-ipcheoleom napuldae

Tto sallangsallang adeughage pieonal ttae

Nan guleum wileul geoddeus pyeon-anhage

Neol hyanghae dagagal tenikka



Igeon deoeobs-i aleumdaun My circus

Ttaelon nun-ap-i ajjilhajiman

Wiheomhalsulog dal-aoleul My circus

Ulin oneul bam eolmana deo aleumdaulkka

Nege deonjil My heart



(Say goodnight yeah) Oh yeah oh yeah

(Say goodnight yeah) jom deo neol geol-eo bwa

(Say goodnight yeah) i bam-e i bam-e Baby

(Say goodnight yeah) ulil matgyeobwa Baby



Saehayan os-eun kkoch-ipcheoleom napuldae

Tto sallangsallang adeughage pieonal ttae

Nan guleum wileul geoddeus pyeon-anhage

Neol hyanghae dagagal tenikka



Igeon deo eobs-i aleumdaun My circus

Ulin maeil bam eolmana deo witaeloulkka

Yunanhi bichnal My heart
